pkgmetadata.longdescription: checkout------------|build status|_.. |build status| image:: https://secure.travis-ci.org/tuomasb/python-checkout.png?branch=master :alt: Build Status.. _build status: http://travis-ci.org/tuomasb/python-checkoutPython wrapper for the Checkout Finland API.Installation------------:: $ pip install checkoutResources---------- `Issue Tracker <http://github.com/tuomasb/python-checkout/issues>`_- `Code <http://github.com/tuomasb/python-checkout>`_- `Development Version <http://github.com/tuomasb/python-checkout/zipball/master#egg=checkout-dev>`_Changelog---------Here you can see the full list of changes between each python-checkoutrelease.0.3.0 (February 6, 2014)^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^- Initual public release of python-checkout.0.2.0 (June 6, 2013)^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^- Initial public release of python-verkkomaksut.
